text: Garcia nutans is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is widespread across Mexico from Sinaloa and San Luis Potosí to Chiapas + Yucatán, as well as being native to Central America, Colombia, and Venezuela.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesCarnevali, G., J.
